price: Ne wͻn a wͻsuro wͻn Wura Nyankopͻn asotwee no.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna hum min ʿadhābi rabbihim mush'fiqūna
